verses.roman:
ucca saṅkīrtana tāte karilā pracāra
sthira-cara jīvera saba khaṇḍāilā saṁsāra"

synonyms: ucca saṅkīrtana—loud chanting of the Hare Kṛṣṇa mantra; tāte—therefore; karilā pracāra—You have spread; sthira-cara—nonmoving and moving; jīvera—of the living entities; saba—all; khaṇḍāilā—You finished; saṁsāra—the bondage to material existence;
translation: "You have preached the loud chanting of the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra and in this way freed all moving and nonmoving living entities from material bondage."
